version_description:
- support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+ displays
- several iOS9 compatibility improvements
- improved ipv6 compatibility
- extended configuration of Opus codec options

- support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+ displays
- several iOS9 compatibility improvements
- improved ipv6 compatibility
- extended configuration of Opus codec options

- faster contacts tab, better integrated with the app
- improved T9 contact search when dialing
- 3D touch support!
- up-to-date with latest iOS versions, many small bug fixes and improvements

- faster contacts tab, better integrated with the app
- improved T9 contact search when dialing
- 3D touch support!
- up-to-date with latest iOS versions, many small bug fixes and improvements

Maintenance release. The previous app had problems with date values read from address book. If you had anyone with two-digit year in birthday filled in (like 76 instead of 1976), the app failed to start. This has been fixed.

Maintenance release. The previous app had problems with date values read from address book. If you had anyone with two-digit year in birthday filled in (like 76 instead of 1976), the app failed to start. This has been fixed.

Maintenance release: The previous versions of the app didn't handle situations when the device had more than 8 different IP addresses. This is becoming common with VoLTE. It made the app shut down when making or receiving a call and it's now FIXED.

Maintenance release: The previous versions of the app didn't handle situations when the device had more than 8 different IP addresses. This is becoming common with VoLTE. It made the app shut down when making or receiving a call and it's now FIXED.

- GRUU support was not working in previous update. This is now fixed.
- some minor stability improvements

- GRUU support was not working in previous update. This is now fixed.
- some minor stability improvements

- longer delays between DTMF digits for more reliable detection
- iOS7 compatibility improvements
- better handover between wifi and cellular networks
- ipv6 compatibility improved
- many minor improvements and fixes

- longer delays between DTMF digits for more reliable detection
- iOS7 compatibility improvements
- better handover between wifi and cellular networks
- ipv6 compatibility improved
- many minor improvements and fixes
This version brings support for iOS 10 CallKit. It's now possible to call directly from iPhone contacts or history and quickly accept incoming calls right from the lock screen.
This version brings support for iOS 10 CallKit. It's now possible to call directly from iPhone contacts or history and quickly accept incoming calls right from the lock screen.

- CallKit and SiriKit integration improvements
- fix dialling of numbers which have DTMF codes appended after a pause (",") character
- fixes an occasional bug which led to a crash when entering history panel
- smooth animation of T9 search results (Settings->Preferences->Controls, T9 search)
- a separate button for dismissing in-call keypad. Swiping it away still works, but it may lead to an unwanted digit to be sent

- CallKit and SiriKit integration improvements
- fix dialling of numbers which have DTMF codes appended after a pause (",") character
- fixes an occasional bug which led to a crash when entering history panel
- smooth animation of T9 search results (Settings->Preferences->Controls, T9 search)
- a separate button for dismissing in-call keypad. Swiping it away still works, but it may lead to an unwanted digit to be sent

- CallKit fix: incoming calls arriving when the app was not running sometime had one-way audio
- correct way to disable CallKit support
- allow system ringtones for CallKit calls
- fixed: incoming VP8 video was broken on "plus" devices
- fixed: when switching contact sorting order from "first-last" to "last-first", the sections were wrong
- opus codec speed optimisations

- CallKit fix: incoming calls arriving when the app was not running sometime had one-way audio
- correct way to disable CallKit support
- allow system ringtones for CallKit calls
- fixed: incoming VP8 video was broken on "plus" devices
- fixed: when switching contact sorting order from "first-last" to "last-first", the sections were wrong
- opus codec speed optimisations
Maintenance release. Several small user interface fixes and improvements, stability improvements, some new translations.
Maintenance release. Several small user interface fixes and improvements, stability improvements, some new translations.

- new, ultra low-bandwidth voice codec: Codec2
- improved reliability of "Standard" incoming call mode on IOS 10.3 (for those who can't use push notifications)
- translations improvements and additions
- several small GUI improvements

- new, ultra low-bandwidth voice codec: Codec2
- improved reliability of "Standard" incoming call mode on IOS 10.3 (for those who can't use push notifications)
- translations improvements and additions
- several small GUI improvements

- improved battery consumption when using "Standard" incoming call mode
- several minor bug fixes and stability improvements

- improved battery consumption when using "Standard" incoming call mode
- several minor bug fixes and stability improvements

- iOS 11 Compatibility
- iPhoneX Compatibility
- other minor bug fixes and improvements

- iOS 11 Compatibility
- iPhoneX Compatibility
- other minor bug fixes and improvements

- improved iPhoneX compatibility
- changed logic of picking 20ms vs. 30ms iLBC mode
- T9 search bug fix: some search results were not clickable
- several missing translations added
- improved h264 video quality

- improved iPhoneX compatibility
- changed logic of picking 20ms vs. 30ms iLBC mode
- T9 search bug fix: some search results were not clickable
- several missing translations added
- improved h264 video quality
WiFi Finder add-on: Search for a free wifi around you in a database of many millions of wifi hotspots around the world.
WiFi Finder add-on: Search for a free wifi around you in a database of many millions of wifi hotspots around the world.
Maintenance release. Fixes some minor bugs and stability issues caused by the previous update.
Maintenance release. Fixes some minor bugs and stability issues caused by the previous update.

- fixes an occasional problem with speakerphone button during the call
- GDPR compliance

- fixes an occasional problem with speakerphone button during the call
- GDPR compliance
improved ipv6 compatibility. This update should fix calling issues in mobile networks in Canada and USA.
improved ipv6 compatibility. This update should fix calling issues in mobile networks in Canada and USA.

- additional ipv6 compatibility improvements
- balance checker was not working reliably after app start - fixed
- vibrate effect on 3D touch
- correct sending of images in messaging (no cropping)

- additional ipv6 compatibility improvements
- balance checker was not working reliably after app start - fixed
- vibrate effect on 3D touch
- correct sending of images in messaging (no cropping)

- iOS 12 compatibility
- GUI facelift
- small bug fixes and stability improvements

- iOS 12 compatibility
- GUI facelift
- small bug fixes and stability improvements

Maintenance release. Fixes for a few bugs introduced by the previous update:
- creating new quick dial items fixed
- SIP display name was not shown on incoming call screen
- long press on quick dial page not handled properly

Maintenance release. Fixes for a few bugs introduced by the previous update:
- creating new quick dial items fixed
- SIP display name was not shown on incoming call screen
- long press on quick dial page not handled properly

maintenance release. Fixes for several bugs introduced in the previous update:
- proximity-based speaker phone was not working - fixed.
- DTMF tones were not sent correctly when using CallKit and native in-all screen
- history search string is remembered between app restart, but after restart, the field is not populated. This makes the history filtered, but search string is not visible, which is confusing.
- iPhone X, XS layout issues fixed

maintenance release. Fixes for several bugs introduced in the previous update:
- proximity-based speaker phone was not working - fixed.
- DTMF tones were not sent correctly when using CallKit and native in-all screen
- history search string is remembered between app restart, but after restart, the field is not populated. This makes the history filtered, but search string is not visible, which is confusing.
- iPhone X, XS layout issues fixed

- customisable fonts (Settings->Preferences->Appearance)
- fixes for several GUI glitches, mostly related to iPhoneX screens (with notch)
- work-around for a bizarre iOS12 bug where a recent voice call makes system camera app unable to focus (!)
- various small fixes and stability improvements

- customisable fonts (Settings->Preferences->Appearance)
- fixes for several GUI glitches, mostly related to iPhoneX screens (with notch)
- work-around for a bizarre iOS12 bug where a recent voice call makes system camera app unable to focus (!)
- various small fixes and stability improvements
maintenance release. No new features, only fixes for several gui glitches and stability improvements.
maintenance release. No new features, only fixes for several gui glitches and stability improvements.

- improved Opus codec quality.
- DTMF digits can be sent when call is on hold
- added support for Diversion: SIP header
- emoji keyboard now showing properly
- improved translations
- many small GUI, performance and stability improvements

- improved Opus codec quality.
- DTMF digits can be sent when call is on hold
- added support for Diversion: SIP header
- emoji keyboard now showing properly
- improved translations
- many small GUI, performance and stability improvements
- fixes an issue with wrong caller id displayed in case the incoming call contains Diversion header
- fixes an issue with wrong caller id displayed in case the incoming call contains Diversion header
Maintenance release. Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.
Maintenance release. Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

- the delay before audio is connected after an incoming call is answered is significantly reduced
- fixed an audio issue which might have caused a helium-voice effect after a switch between Wifi and cellular network
- bug fixes, stability improvements

- the delay before audio is connected after an incoming call is answered is significantly reduced
- fixed an audio issue which might have caused a helium-voice effect after a switch between Wifi and cellular network
- bug fixes, stability improvements
Maintenance release. Fixes a bug when calling a number from history tab.
Maintenance release. Fixes a bug when calling a number from history tab.
iOS 13 compatibility improvements
iOS 13 compatibility improvements
bugfix release: the previous update broke compatibility with old devices (iPhone5 and older)
bugfix release: the previous update broke compatibility with old devices (iPhone5 and older)

- significant audio quality improvement, especially under high-jitter network conditions
- iOS 13 push notifications compatibility improvements
- lots of minor fixes and stability improvements
- translation improvements

- significant audio quality improvement, especially under high-jitter network conditions
- iOS 13 push notifications compatibility improvements
- lots of minor fixes and stability improvements
- translation improvements

- Improved Bluetooth headset compatibility
- Fixes for several bugs introduced by the previous release

- Improved Bluetooth headset compatibility
- Fixes for several bugs introduced by the previous release
